description: "Made for ‘A History of Java’ by Sir Stamford Raffles, this map includes a list of administrative districts with their populations, and four inset maps of harbours. Another inset map shows rocks and minerals, mountains and volcanoes, and teak forests."
title: "A map of Java : chiefly from surveys made during the British administration constructed in illustration of an account of Java by Thomas Stamford Raffles Esq."
